comment: the enzyme from Pseudomonas fluorescens TN5 uses NADH as hydrogen-donor (see R08764)
definition: Oxygen + 6-Hydroxynicotinate + Reduced acceptor <=> 2,5-Dihydroxypyridine + CO2 + Acceptor + H2O
name: 6-hydroxynicotinate,hydrogen-donor:oxygen oxidoreductase (3-hydroxylating, decarboxylating)
